trans-unit.resname: RTR·1 | Angel of Serenity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Serenity
trans-unit.target: 清朗天使

trans-unit.resname: RTR·1 | Angel of Serenity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从战场放逐其他的目标生物和／或从任意坟墓场放逐生物牌，上述数量至多为三。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐的牌各移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Armory Guard
trans-unit.target: 军械库守卫

trans-unit.resname: RTR·2 | Armory Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控门，CARDNAME便具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."
trans-unit.target: 底密尔密探在阴影中监视着。「八小时了，我还没看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低声咒骂。「我们还是另寻入口吧。」

trans-unit.source: Arrest
trans-unit.target: 逮捕

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。

trans-unit.source: "We will prove your guilt. We don't arrest the innocent, you know."\n—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct
trans-unit.target: 「我们将证明你有罪。你要知道，我们不逮捕无罪的人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉温妮

trans-unit.source: Avenging Arrow
trans-unit.target: 复仇箭

trans-unit.resname: RTR·4 | Avenging Arrow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标于本回合造成过伤害的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."\n—Alcarus, Selesnya archer
trans-unit.target: 「偷窃可以原谅。欺瞒绝不宽恕。」 ～瑟雷尼亚弓箭手艾凯勒

trans-unit.source: Azorius Arrester
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立逮捕人

trans-unit.resname: RTR·5 | Azorius Arrester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.source: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."
trans-unit.target: 「你有权保持缄默。主要是因为我懒得听你找藉口。」

trans-unit.source: Azorius Justiciar
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立大司法

trans-unit.resname: RTR·6 | Azorius Justiciar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，拘留至多两个目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，这些生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.source: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."
trans-unit.target: 「你有犯罪的可能性，因此有必要进一步调查。」

trans-unit.source: Bazaar Krovod
trans-unit.target: 市集克瓦兽

trans-unit.resname: RTR·7 | Bazaar Krovod | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，另一个目标进行攻击的生物得+0/+2直到回合结束。重置该生物。

trans-unit.source: The Hauler's Collective wields great influence over the Ravnican merchant class. Without it, little moves in the city.
trans-unit.target: 载运公合对拉尼卡商贩阶级握有极大的影响力。少了它，整座城市什么事都做不成。

trans-unit.source: Concordia Pegasus
trans-unit.target: 齐心飞马

trans-unit.resname: RTR·8 | Concordia Pegasus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "A kick from its hooves is like a bolt of lightning. I'd know. I've been hit by both."\n—Rencz, Izzet chemister's aide
trans-unit.target: 「被它的蹄子踢中有如遭雷劈。我知道的。因为我两个都挨过。」 ～伊捷化学师助手连兹

trans-unit.target: 空灵铠

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你每操控一个结界，所结附的生物便得+1/+1且具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.
trans-unit.target: 金属难寻，工匠昂贵，而铠甲又笨重。

trans-unit.target: 苍穹之眼

trans-unit.source: Put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物放进战场，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: RTR·10 | Eyes in the Skies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."\n—Zunak, Selesnya strategist
trans-unit.target: 「树根与树枝到不了之处，都有我们长翅膀的朋友照顾。」 ～瑟雷尼亚策士祖奈

trans-unit.source: Fencing Ace
trans-unit.target: 击剑高手

trans-unit.target: 连击（此生物能造成先攻伤害以及普通战斗伤害。）

trans-unit.source: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.
trans-unit.target: 他的英勇让无所属者有希望，让他们得以坚决抵抗暴行。

trans-unit.target: 哭号幻影

trans-unit.source: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物放进战场。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: "The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few."\n—Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar
trans-unit.target: 「社会的利益比少数人的不便更加重要。」 ～俄佐立轻骑兵艾门塞夫

trans-unit.target: 所有将对你或另一个由你操控的永久物所造成的伤害，改为对CARDNAME造成之。

trans-unit.target: 她拒绝对公会誓诚，并为那些无法保护自己的人们而战。

trans-unit.source: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.
trans-unit.target: 将军死后，终于和超过三十场战役中的阵亡士兵重聚。

trans-unit.source: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

trans-unit.source: Populate. Creatures you control are indestructible this turn. (To populate, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy indestructible creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 殖民。由你操控的生物本回合不会毁坏。（殖民的方法，是将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。伤害与注明「消灭」的效应无法消灭不会毁坏的生物。）

trans-unit.source: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.
trans-unit.target: 在耸立的撒莫林树木以及守护这些树木的掠食者之间，拉尼卡的瀚力已复归。

trans-unit.source: Archweaver
trans-unit.target: 拱门蜘蛛

trans-unit.source: Reach, trample
trans-unit.target: 延势，践踏

trans-unit.source: The silk of the archweavers adds structural integrity to otherwise unstable Izzet building sites.
trans-unit.target: 拱门蜘蛛吐的丝替原本不那么稳定的伊捷建筑工地增强了结构完整性。

trans-unit.source: Axebane Guardian
trans-unit.target: 禁伐林守护者

trans-unit.resname: RTR·115 | Axebane Guardian | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {T}：加X点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色组合可任意选择，X为由你操控的具守军异能的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.
trans-unit.target: 只有少数精英才获准进入禁伐林这片具有感知能力的树林。

trans-unit.source: Axebane Stag
trans-unit.target: 禁伐林鹿

trans-unit.source: "When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."\n—Kirce, Axebane guardian
trans-unit.target: 「当海枯石烂时，他将取得他应有的地位，成为大自然之王。」 ～禁伐林守护者科丝

trans-unit.source: Brushstrider
trans-unit.target: 拂行兽

trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.source: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.
trans-unit.target: 在破了几扇窗、少了许多薄饼糕后，执政官鲁迪终于同意替拂行兽指派一片专属土地。

trans-unit.source: Centaur's Herald
trans-unit.target: 半人马的传令使

trans-unit.resname: RTR·118 | Centaur's Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，牺牲CARDNAME：将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.
trans-unit.target: 他们离维图加基越远，就让群众越加忠贞。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·119 | Chorus of Might | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chorus of Might
trans-unit.target: 瀚力韵集

trans-unit.resname: RTR·119 | Chorus of Might | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，你每操控一个生物，目标生物便得+1/+1并获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·119 | Chorus of Might | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In each of us is the strength of all of us."\n—Trostani
trans-unit.target: 「每个人的心中都有着我们全体的力量。」 ～卓塔妮

trans-unit.source: Deadbridge Goliath
trans-unit.target: 亡桥巨甲虫

trans-unit.resname: RTR·120 | Deadbridge Goliath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 食腐{4}{G}{G}（{4}{G}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Some Golgari insects live for centuries—and they never stop growing.
trans-unit.target: 有些葛加理昆虫可以活数百年，而且它们不会停止成长。

trans-unit.source: Death's Presence
trans-unit.target: 亡者存形

trans-unit.resname: RTR·121 | Death's Presence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为该死去生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: "We traffic in flesh, not souls. Still, it's a shame to let anything go to waste."\n—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
trans-unit.target: 「我们买卖的是肉体，不是灵魂。但话说回来，任何的浪费都非常可惜。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

trans-unit.source: Drudge Beetle
trans-unit.target: 苦力甲虫

trans-unit.resname: RTR·122 | Drudge Beetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 食腐{5}{G}（{5}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.
trans-unit.target: 街虫群是葛加理的劳工阶级，推动着永恒的生死循环。

trans-unit.source: Druid's Deliverance
trans-unit.target: 德鲁伊的解救

trans-unit.resname: RTR·123 | Druid's Deliverance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将对你造成的所有战斗伤害。 殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."
trans-unit.target: 「虽面对各种逆境，但我们就像小草，只会弯腰，不会折断。」

trans-unit.source: Gatecreeper Vine
trans-unit.target: 蔓门野葛

trans-unit.resname: RTR·124 | Gatecreeper Vine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or a Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 守军 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌或门牌，展示该牌，将它置入你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Every inch of Ravnica is home to something.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的每一吋土地都是某种生物的家。

trans-unit.source: Giant Growth
trans-unit.target: 变巨术

trans-unit.resname: RTR·125 | Giant Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants."\n—Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2
trans-unit.target: 「禁止所有巨人无缘无故丢掷市民的法令，应该延伸至突发状况下的巨人。」 ～伊佩利的法令，第VII.789.2条款

trans-unit.source: Gobbling Ooze
trans-unit.target: 疾吞黏泞

trans-unit.resname: RTR·126 | Gobbling Ooze | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {G}，牺牲另一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: The furious citizens blamed the Simic for releasing it in their district. The Simic pointed out that rats were no longer a problem.
trans-unit.target: 狂怒的市民怪罪析米克不该将它在他们的街区放生。析米克辩称鼠患已获解决。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Decoy
trans-unit.target: 葛加理诱饵

trans-unit.resname: RTR·127 | Golgari Decoy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block CARDNAME do so.\nScavenge {3}{G}{G} ({3}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡CARDNAME的生物皆须阻挡之。 食腐{3}{G}{G}（{3}{G}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Horncaller's Chant
trans-unit.target: 唤角师吟颂

trans-unit.resname: RTR·128 | Horncaller's Chant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 将一个4/4绿色，具践踏异能的犀牛衍生生物放进战场，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: "The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"\n—Teysa, to Isperia
trans-unit.target: 「瑟雷尼亚正在召集军队。你还是认为他们尚未备战吗？」 ～泰莎告诉伊佩利

trans-unit.source: Korozda Monitor
trans-unit.target: 柯罗札监卫

trans-unit.resname: RTR·129 | Korozda Monitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nScavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 食腐{5}{G}{G}（{5}{G}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Mana Bloom
trans-unit.target: 魔力绽华

trans-unit.resname: RTR·130 | Mana Bloom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.\nRemove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME has no charge counters on it, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个充电指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。此异能每回合只能起动一次。 在你的维持开始时，若CARDNAME上面没有充电指示物，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·131 | Oak Street Innkeeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oak Street Innkeeper
trans-unit.target: 橡树街旅店主

trans-unit.resname: RTR·131 | Oak Street Innkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as it's not your turn, tapped creatures you control have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 只要不是在你的回合中，由你操控且已横置的生物便具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·131 | Oak Street Innkeeper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The city is vast and perilous, but there are places where a weary traveler can feel very much at home.
trans-unit.target: 整座城辽阔而又危险，但城中有几处能让疲惫的旅人很有家的感觉。

trans-unit.source: Rubbleback Rhino
trans-unit.target: 砾脊犀牛

trans-unit.resname: RTR·132 | Rubbleback Rhino | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 辟邪（此生物不能成为由你对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.
trans-unit.target: 这场麻烦的起因是：某个流浪儿和鬼怪赌咒，如果骑得上它，薛宝之塔的钟就会敲响十三声。

trans-unit.source: Savage Surge
trans-unit.target: 凶蛮翻腾

trans-unit.resname: RTR·133 | Savage Surge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。重置该生物。

trans-unit.source: Gruul warriors never need to be stirred to battle. They need only to be shown where the battle is.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁战士从不需要激励作战士气。只要告诉他们上哪里打仗就行了。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·134 | Seek the Horizon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seek the Horizon
trans-unit.target: 探寻天际

trans-unit.resname: RTR·134 | Seek the Horizon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，并将它们置入你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·134 | Seek the Horizon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Raked by vertical spikes of glass and stone, Ravnica's vistas offer only a rare glimpse of the horizon.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的景色充斥耸立的玻璃与石头尖塔，只能得见少许的地平线。

trans-unit.source: Slime Molding
trans-unit.target: 黏泞塑型

trans-unit.resname: RTR·135 | Slime Molding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将一个X/X绿色流浆衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."\n—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
trans-unit.target: 「给我足够的废物和法术力，我就能召唤可将拉尼卡整个吞没的流浆。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

trans-unit.source: Stonefare Crocodile
trans-unit.target: 石展鳄鱼

trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: CARDNAME gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：CARDNAME获得系命异能直到回合结束。（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.source: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷利用地底城的计划遇上了难缠的阻碍。

trans-unit.source: Towering Indrik
trans-unit.target: 雄立巨犀兽

trans-unit.resname: RTR·137 | Towering Indrik | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.
trans-unit.target: 他会一直追捕飞空猎物，完全不顾其蹄下所粉碎的亡魂。

trans-unit.source: Urban Burgeoning
trans-unit.target: 城市萌芽

trans-unit.resname: RTR·138 | Urban Burgeoning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地具有「于每位其他牌手的重置步骤中重置此地。」

trans-unit.source: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.
trans-unit.target: 旧布拉夫遗迹成为了一片野生空间，尽管所有的雀鸟都因俄佐立法术而无声无息。

trans-unit.source: Wild Beastmaster
trans-unit.target: 狂野驯兽师

trans-unit.resname: RTR·139 | Wild Beastmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，由你操控的每个其他生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.source: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."
trans-unit.target: 「他们用城市覆盖世界，却让自己少了逃跑的空间。」

trans-unit.source: Worldspine Wurm
trans-unit.target: 世脊亚龙

trans-unit.resname: RTR·140 | Worldspine Wurm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME dies, put three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample onto the battlefield.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME死去时，将三个5/5绿色，具践踏异能的亚龙衍生生物放进战场。 当CARDNAME从任何地方置入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: Abrupt Decay
trans-unit.target: 突发衰败

trans-unit.resname: RTR·141 | Abrupt Decay | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities.\nDestroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击。 消灭目标非地永久物，且其总法术力费用等于或小于3。

trans-unit.source: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷联盟很快停止了他们的终生保证政策。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·142 | Archon of the Triumvirate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archon of the Triumvirate
trans-unit.target: 三盟统领

trans-unit.resname: RTR·142 | Archon of the Triumvirate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，拘留至多两个目标由对手操控的非地永久物。（直到你的下一个回合，这些永久物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.source: Armada Wurm
trans-unit.target: 巨舰亚龙

trans-unit.resname: RTR·143 | Armada Wurm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个5/5绿色，具践踏异能的亚龙衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: No one in the Conclave acts alone.
trans-unit.target: 在盟会中，没有人是单独行动。

trans-unit.source: Auger Spree
trans-unit.target: 钻法无歇

trans-unit.resname: RTR·144 | Auger Spree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"\n—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
trans-unit.target: 「终于有柄波洛斯无法没收的武器！」 ～裘里剧团业主裘里

trans-unit.source: Azorius Charm
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立护符

trans-unit.resname: RTR·145 | Azorius Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one — Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn; or draw a card; or put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～由你操控的生物获得系命异能直到回合结束；或抓一张牌；或将目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "The rules of logic and order have already made the choice for you."\n—Isperia
trans-unit.target: 「逻辑与秩序的规则已替你做出了决定。」 ～伊佩利

trans-unit.resname: RTR·146 | Call of the Conclave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call of the Conclave
trans-unit.target: 盟会的呼唤

trans-unit.resname: RTR·146 | Call of the Conclave | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·146 | Call of the Conclave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.
trans-unit.target: 半人马被派往古鲁领地传福音，该处战争的号令压过和平的祷词。

trans-unit.source: Carnival Hellsteed
trans-unit.target: 游行狱驹

trans-unit.resname: RTR·147 | Carnival Hellsteed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike, haste\nUnleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻，敏捷 脱缰（你可以让此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。只要其上有+1/+1指示物，它就不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Its favorite treats are candied hands and sweet hearts.
trans-unit.target: 他最喜爱的点心是糖渍的手以及甜心。

trans-unit.source: Centaur Healer
trans-unit.target: 半人马治疗师

trans-unit.resname: RTR·148 | Centaur Healer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.
trans-unit.target: 卡沙拿训练场的指导者都是能干的治疗师，以防他们的学生无法拿捏分寸。

trans-unit.source: Chemister's Trick
trans-unit.target: 化学师的诡计

trans-unit.resname: RTR·149 | Chemister's Trick | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.\nOverload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标不由你操控的生物得-2/-0且本回合若能攻击，则必须进行攻击。 超载{3}{U}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.source: Collective Blessing
trans-unit.target: 集体祝福

trans-unit.resname: RTR·150 | Collective Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立的参议员往往会雇用密探暗中监视瑟雷尼亚。他们必须报告所见到的一草一木，因为全都可能成为致命的敌人。

trans-unit.source: Common Bond
trans-unit.target: 共同联系

trans-unit.resname: RTR·151 | Common Bond | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nPut a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Wolf riders hone their skills traversing the perilous rooftops, each dizzying step bringing elf and wolf closer together.
trans-unit.target: 狼骑兵靠横渡陡险的屋顶来磨炼技巧，每踏出惊险的一步，都让妖精和狼配合得更加紧密。

trans-unit.source: Corpsejack Menace
trans-unit.target: 占尸威逼

trans-unit.resname: RTR·152 | Corpsejack Menace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be placed on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are placed on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将会在由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在其上放置该数量两倍的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 软弱非群落的天性。

trans-unit.source: Counterflux
trans-unit.target: 魔力断流

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities.\nCounter target spell you don't control.\nOverload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击。 反击目标不由你操控的咒语。 超载{1}{U}{U}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.target: 骏马相随

trans-unit.source: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物放进战场，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.
trans-unit.target: 令人忧心的谣言已传入卓塔妮耳中。她下令任何人不得单独出行。

trans-unit.source: Detention Sphere
trans-unit.target: 扣留法球

trans-unit.resname: RTR·155 | Detention Sphere | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named CARDNAME and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标非地、且名称不是CARDNAME的永久物，以及与该永久物同名的所有其他永久物。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Dramatic Rescue
trans-unit.target: 戏剧性拯救

trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow."\n—Mirela, Azorius hussar
trans-unit.target: 「我从未想过自己会希望两吨重的尖喙与利爪以飞箭之速朝我压过来。」 ～俄佐立轻骑兵米瑞拉

trans-unit.source: Dreadbore

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.
trans-unit.target: 在拉铎司的地盘，每个人都是表演的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Dreg Mangler
trans-unit.target: 残渣破坏者

trans-unit.source: Haste\nScavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 食腐{3}{B}{G}（{3}{B}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Epic Experiment
trans-unit.target: 壮绝实验

trans-unit.source: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each instant and sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less among them, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。对其中每张总法术力费用等于或小于X的瞬间与法术牌而言，你可以施放该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。然后将所有以此法放逐并且未施放的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。CARDNAME对该咒语的操控者造成伤害，其数量等同于该咒语的力量。

trans-unit.source: "The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."\n—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker
trans-unit.target: 「其他公会将学到惨痛教训；绝不该干涉我们的调查。」 ～伊捷觅爆师波力安东

trans-unit.source: "My ruling is final. Order is upheld. Justice is done."
trans-unit.target: 「判决已定。秩序已得维持。正义已得伸张。」

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～所有生物得-1/-1直到回合结束；或消灭目标结界；或重生每个由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.target: 「拉尼卡的其他人尽管嘲笑我吧。无论如何，地底城都将是他们的最终归宿。」 ～贾雷

trans-unit.target: 他们之间没有血缘，但系绊比家人更紧密。这就是世界之魂的献礼。

trans-unit.source: What some see as "distracted" is really "fathoming the unfathomable."

trans-unit.source: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

trans-unit.source: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 脱缰（你可以让此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。只要其上有+1/+1指示物，它就不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.
trans-unit.target: 魔鬼之刃与其上滴落的鲜血，谱成了拉铎司永不厌倦的美妙乐声。

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Shred-Freak
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司使刀狂人

trans-unit.resname: RTR·221 | Rakdos Shred-Freak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.source: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."
trans-unit.target: 「如果真有灵魂这种东西，我认为会位在胆囊后面，就位于肾脏的上方。」

trans-unit.source: Slitherhead
trans-unit.target: 滑地颅

trans-unit.source: Scavenge {0} ({0}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 食腐{0}（{0}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: "It makes better use of Uncle Dragi's head than he ever did."\n—Pesha, retired blacksmith
trans-unit.target: 「它让德基叔叔的脑袋终于有了用处。」 ～退休铁匠佩沙

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."\n—Trostani
trans-unit.target: 「总有一天，每根柱子都将成为树木，而每座厅堂都将会是林地。」 ～卓塔妮

trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.source: For the Azorius, the opportunity to serve the law is too great an honor for death to interrupt.
trans-unit.target: 对俄佐立来说，效忠律法的机会是极大荣耀，连死亡都不可将之干预。

trans-unit.source: "The higher the mind soars, the greater its understanding of the law."\n—Isperia

trans-unit.source: Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物每具有一种颜色，便得+1/+0。 佩带{1}

trans-unit.source: Like a single ant, it only hints at the colony below.

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 {U}{R}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为2/1蓝红双色的元素神器生物。 每当CARDNAME对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.
trans-unit.target: 怯懦者想在血腥节庆开始之前刺上一针。罪人则是在之后。

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 {B}{R}：CARDNAME成为3/1黑红双色，具有先攻异能的魔鬼神器生物直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The Rakdos use it for everything you can think of and plenty more than that.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司将它用于所有你想像得出的东西，以及更多超乎你想像的。

trans-unit.source: A mark of unity when you want one; a fierce guardian when you need one.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要的时候是同心的象征；当你需要的时候是勇猛的守护者。

trans-unit.target: 扫街机漫无目的地扫荡，刷去废物以及来不及闪避的一切事物。

trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两种颜色。 每当你施放咒语时，若该咒语的颜色与所选颜色至少有一种相符，则其每符合一种所选颜色，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RTR·235 | Tablet of the Guilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is rumored the Azorius paid an exorbitant sum to ensure its symbol would appear at the top.
trans-unit.target: 据说俄佐立支付了极高的金额以确保其标志会出现在最上方。

trans-unit.source: Volatile Rig
trans-unit.target: 易爆设备

trans-unit.resname: RTR·236 | Volatile Rig | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Trample
CARDNAME attacks each turn if able.
Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice CARDNAME.
When CARDNAME dies, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, it deals 4 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，掷一枚硬币。如果你输掉此掷，牺牲CARDNAME。 当CARDNAME死去时，掷一枚硬币。如果你输掉此掷，则它对每个生物和每个牌手造成4点伤害。
